titleStmt.title: A pronostycacyon [sic] of Erra Pater, Doctor in Astronomye, and phesyke profytable for to kepe the body in helth, [and] Ptholome sayth the same.
Book of knowledge
titleStmt.author: Erra Pater.

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprynted by me (Robert Wyer) for Richarde Bankes,

notesStmt.note: Imprint from colophon; publication date suggested by STC.
Colophon printed with Wyer's name enclosed in round brackets.
Identified as STC 10518 on UMI microfilm reel 49.
Reproduction of the original in the Cambridge University Library.
